body_html:
As a very non-minimal working example:

  • Install julia v0.5,
  • then running `Pkg.add("TensorFlow.jl") in the julia REPL
  • replace ~/.julia/v0.5/TensorFlow.jl/deps/usr/bin/libtensorflow.so, with a libtensorflow that was compiled without using @malmaud's patch
  • then run Pkg.test("TensorFlow.jl")

IIRC, 2 or 3 tests in the Packages testsets will fail because of this issue.
At some point, I can re-run the above set of steps and post the core for those tests here.
I do believe they are related to the while loop.
and it was the dynamic_rnn tests: https://github.com/malmaud/TensorFlow.jl/blob/f3cfa3342e92ce15564b33298bcd67d8827f0c00/test/nn.jl#L38-L96
body_text:
As a very non-minimal working example:

Install julia v0.5,
then running `Pkg.add("TensorFlow.jl") in the julia REPL
replace ~/.julia/v0.5/TensorFlow.jl/deps/usr/bin/libtensorflow.so, with a libtensorflow that was compiled without using @malmaud's patch
then run Pkg.test("TensorFlow.jl")

IIRC, 2 or 3 tests in the Packages testsets will fail because of this issue.
At some point, I can re-run the above set of steps and post the core for those tests here.
I do believe they are related to the while loop.
and it was the dynamic_rnn tests: https://github.com/malmaud/TensorFlow.jl/blob/f3cfa3342e92ce15564b33298bcd67d8827f0c00/test/nn.jl#L38-L96
body:
As a very non-minimal working example:

- Install [julia v0.5](https://julialang.org/downloads/),
- then running `Pkg.add("TensorFlow.jl") in the julia REPL
- replace `~/.julia/v0.5/TensorFlow.jl/deps/usr/bin/libtensorflow.so`, with a `libtensorflow` that was compiled without using @malmaud's [patch](https://github.com/malmaud/TensorFlow.jl/blob/master/deps/build_libtensorflow/cpu/upstream_patch)
- then run `Pkg.test("TensorFlow.jl")` 

IIRC, 2 or 3 tests in the Packages testsets will fail because of this issue.
At some point, I can re-run the above set of steps and post the core for those tests here.
I do believe they *are* related to the while loop.
and it was the dynamic_rnn tests: https://github.com/malmaud/TensorFlow.jl/blob/f3cfa3342e92ce15564b33298bcd67d8827f0c00/test/nn.jl#L38-L96
